categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Ryder's camp, known previously as Vizago's camp, was the Lothal base of operations of the Devaronian crime lord Cikatro Vizago and his Broken Horn Syndicate, and later the Lothal resistance group. The camp was located in a stone circle, and was in use in the years prior to the Battle of Yavin.
